title: [Large-Scale] Acoustic Utilization Strategies for Advanced Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of college-level foundational mathematics and experience applying mathematics in specialized domains
context.additional_context: An advanced mathematics course conducted in a classroom setting using digital devices (tablets/laptops).

learning_goals: Learners can explain the structure of complex mathematical concepts with 80% accuracy using auditory cues (music, sound effects, narration)
Learners can self-correct errors occurring during problem-solving processes three or more times through auditory feedback
Learners can design blended learning strategies combining auditory-based learning tools with traditional learning methods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
